dict.string: Roots needs access to your calendar to show and schedule classes and events.
Roots needs access to your reminders to show tasks alongside your assignments.
Roots needs full calendar access to display and manage your schedule across courses and tasks.
Roots needs full reminders access to sync and manage your tasks safely across devices.
Roots uses Face ID to securely authenticate you when required features request identity verification.
Roots uses notifications to alert you when timers or scheduled tasks are finished.
